sent.orig: One night, Doctor Close was on a plane, returning from a visit to the United States.
sent.trans: 一天晚上，Close医生在从美国访问返回的飞机上。

sent.orig: The tail end of the wind close discharge device is provided with a wind close board.
sent.trans: 闭风出料器的末端有一个关风板。

sent.orig: She is very close to her father/She and her father are very close.
sent.trans: 她和父亲的关系很亲密。

sent.orig: Decrease lose even if add close, tell conversely, increase a burden to be decreased namely close.
sent.trans: 减负就是增收，反过来讲，增加负担就是减收。

sent.orig: Our concept is always close to the market, close to the user.
sent.trans: 我们的理念就是永远贴近市场，贴近用户。
